mapper.select: SELECT * FROM boardgame.notice WHERE game_no = #{gameNo} or game_no = 0 ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, description, showtime, endtime, type, regdate, link, writer, game_no) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{showTime}, #{endTime}, #{type}, CURDATE(), #{link}, #{writer}, #{gameNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, showtime = #{showTime}, endtime = #{endTime}, type = #{type}, link = #{link}, writer = #{writer}, game_no=#{gameNo} WHERE no = #{no}
